en_US.project_summary: dxpool.com provides multi-cryptocurrency mining service, including  LTC, KDA, CKB,  XMR etc... In DxPool you will enjoy higher profits, lower pool fee, more stable pool system and better customer service. Besides, mining profits calculator, hashrate alert  are provided to make your mining more convenient.

zh_CN.project_summary: 大象矿池提供LTC、XMR、KDA、CKB等多币种挖矿服务。在大象池挖矿，您将拥有更稳定的矿池系统，更高的挖矿收益，更优惠的费率及更优质的运营服务。同时还有理论收益比较、算力报警等便捷功能，让挖矿更省心。
